method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the Object. Example: Dim ph As ICOSPhone ph.Initialize("ph")

method.name: Farenheit
method.comment: Example: Dim ph As ICOSPhone dim Label1 As Label Label1.Text=ph.TempFarenheit Return the degrees in Farenheit of your Battery

method.name: MakeCall
method.comment:
Examples: Dim Button1 As Button Dim ph As ICOSPhone
Sub Button1_Click ph.MakeCall End Sub

method.name: StartCamera
method.comment:
Examples: Dim Button1 As Button Dim ph As ICOSPhone
Sub Button1_Click ph.StartCamera End Sub Start On the Camera

method.name: LedOnOff
method.comment:
Example: Dim ph As ICOSPhone ph.LedOnOff Flash Mode On
This W'll turn Flash Mode ON or OFF if is supported.

method.name: GetDisplayMetricsWidth
method.comment: Example: Dim ph As ICOSPhone ph.GetDisplayWidth return the Display Width in pixel (ex. 600)

method.name: GetDisplayMetricsHeight
method.comment: Example: Dim ph As ICOSPhone ph.GetDisplayHeight return the DisplayHeight in pixel (ex. 1024)

method.name: WiFiOnOff
method.comment:
Examples: Dim Button1 As Button Dim ph As ICOSPhone
Sub Button1_Click ph.EnableDisableWiFi End Sub Enable / Disable your WIFI

method.name: Celsius
method.comment: Example: Dim ph As ICOSPhone dim Label1 As Label Label1.Text=ph.TempCelsius Return the degrees in Celsius of your Battery

method.name: OpenWiFiSettings
method.comment:
Examples: Dim Button1 As Button Dim ph As ICOSPhone
Sub Button1_Click ph.OpenWifiSettings End Sub Open WiFi Settings

method.name: BluetoothOnOff
method.comment:
Examples: Dim Button1 As Button Dim ph As ICOSPhone
Sub Button1_Click ph.EnableDisableBluetooth End Sub Enable or Disable BlueTooth

method.name: Level
method.comment:
Example: Dim ph As ICOSPhone Dim Pb As ProgressBar Dim Button1 As Button
Sub Button1_Click pb.Progress=Level End Sub Return the amount of level of your Battery

method.name: GPSOnOff
method.comment: Example: Dim ph As ICOSPhone ph.GPSOnOff W'll start GPS On or Off

method.name: OpenGpsSetting
method.comment:
Examples: Dim Button1 As Button Dim ph As ICOSPhone
Sub Button1_Click ph.OpenGpsSetting End Sub Open Gps Setting

property.name: AccessWiFiState
property.comment: Example: Dim ph As ICOSPhone ph.AccessWiFiState return the AccessWiFiState

property.name: SimCardNumber
property.comment: Example: Dim ph As ICOSPhone ph.SimCardNumber return the SimCardNumber

property.name: AvailMemory
property.comment:
Examples: Dim Button1 As Button Dim Label1 As Label Dim ph As ICOSPhone
Sub Button1_Click label1.Text=ph.AvailMemory End Sub Return Avail Memory

property.name: Brightness
property.comment: Example: Dim ph As ICOSPhone ph.Brightness W'll set the Brightness of your screen

property.name: OSVersion
property.comment:
Examples: Dim Button1 As Button Dim Label1 As Label Dim ph As ICOSPhone
Sub Button1_Click label1.Text=ph.OSVersion End Sub Display OSVersion of your device

property.name: TotalMemory
property.comment:
Examples: Dim Button1 As Button Dim Label1 As Label Dim ph As ICOSPhone
Sub Button1_Click label1.Text=ph.TotalMemory End Sub Return Total Memory

property.name: DeviceModel
property.comment:
Examples: Dim Button1 As Button Dim Label1 As Label Dim ph As ICOSPhone
Sub Button1_Click label1.Text=ph.DeviceModel End Sub Display the model of your device

property.name: MacAddres
property.comment: Example: Dim ph As ICOSPhone ph.MacAddres return the MacAddres

property.name: BlueToothSerial
property.comment: Example: Dim ph As ICOSPhone ph.BlueToothSerial If the Bluetooth is on w'll return the serial

property.name: NetworkOperatorName
property.comment:
Examples: Dim Button1 As Button Dim Label1 As Label Dim ph As ICOSPhone
Sub Button1_Click label1.Text=ph.NetworkOperatorName End Sub Display the name of your NetworkOperator

property.name: IPAddress
property.comment:
Examples: Dim Button1 As Button Dim Label1 As Label Dim ph As ICOSPhone
Sub Button1_Click label1.Text=ph.IPAddress End Sub Display your IP-Address

property.name: UsedMemory
property.comment:
Examples: Dim Button1 As Button Dim Label1 As Label Dim ph As ICOSPhone
Sub Button1_Click label1.Text=ph.UsedMemory End Sub Return Used Memory

property.name: Version
property.comment: Return The Version Of this Library
